title: byt configuration
description: Configuration schema for byt - Byteowlz meta-tool

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor support

workspace.description: Workspace root directory. All repos should be subdirectories of this path. Supports ~ and environment variables. Auto-detected if not set.

catalog_path.description: Path to CATALOG.json (relative to workspace or absolute). Default: govnr/CATALOG.json

ignore_dirs.description: Directories to ignore when scanning for repositories

github_org.description: GitHub organization/user. Used as default when repo name has no org prefix.

aur_ssh_key_path.description: Path to SSH private key registered with AUR. Supports ~ expansion.

tap_token_name.description: Name of the GitHub secret for homebrew-tap/scoop-bucket access

repo_path.description: Path to schemas repository (relative to workspace or absolute)

patterns.description: Glob patterns to find schema files in repos

base_url.description: Base URL for schema references (used in $schema fields)

sync_dir.description: Directory for memory sync files (relative to workspace or absolute). Set to 'govnr/.sync/memories' to keep sync files in the govnr repo.

machines.description: All machines in the ecosystem. byt auto-detects which is local by matching hostname.

hostname.description: Hostname to match against (compared with `hostname` command output). If not set, uses 'name' as the hostname.

host.description: SSH host (user@host or just host) - used when connecting remotely. If not set, uses hostname (or name if hostname not set).

workspace.description: Path to workspace on this machine
